author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Home2 Suites by Hilton Expands to WyomingTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Home2 Suites by Hilton Expands to Wyoming
Home2 Suites by Hilton, Hilton Worldwide’s award-winning mid-tier, all-suite hotel brand designed for modern business travelers and extended stay guests, announced today the opening of Home2 Suites by Hilton Gillette. The new property, owned by KAJ Hospitality and located at 1120 E. Boxelder Road, offers 99 suites to the Gillette market.
Home2 Suites-Gillette is located southeast of I-90 and is near several dining options and Powder Basin Shopping Center. Visitors can enjoy a leisurely game of golf at the nearby Gillette Golf Club, enjoy Dalbey Memorial Park, and catch a concert or attend a conference at the Cam-Plex Multi-Event Center. The Gillette Campbell County Airport is less than 10 minutes from the hotel.
“Our latest Home2 property opening in Gillette supports our continued growth in the western part of the United States,” said Bill Duncan, global head, Homewood Suites by Hilton and Home2 Suites by Hilton. “Guests will see our fresh, new approach to the extended stay market while receiving a great value and added convenience during their stay.”
The hotel offers guests trademark Home2 Suites amenities, such as the Oasis lobby, Home2 MKT for grab-and-go items, Spin2 Cycle, a combined laundry and fitness area, and complimentary continental breakfast at the Inspired Table. The Inspired Table offers a variety of morning favorites such as, hot artisan breakfast sandwiches, waffles, yogurt and more. Each Home2 Suites features a kitchen in the room, for the traveler’s convenience. The hotel also features a heated indoor pool for guests’ use. And, all Home2 Suites properties are pet-friendly.
Home2 Suites-Gillette participates in Hilton HHonors®, the only hotel loyalty program that allows members to earn Points & Miles® on the same stay with No Blackout Dates on reward stays. HHonors members always get our lowest price with our Best Price Guarantee, along with HHonors Points, digital check-in and no booking fees only when they book directly through Hilton.
